DOC.detailed_description: For majority patient advance heart failure , medical treatment partially effective relieve heart failure symptom . Therefore , recommend palliative care initiate soon diagnosis . There need complementary , nonpharmacologic intervention could easily implement health care provider provide palliative care . Three major pathologic pathway underlie heart failure symptom identify : fluid overload , inflammation , oxidative stress . Prior research demonstrate three nutrients-sodium , omega-3 fatty acid , lycopene-can alter pathologic pathway . Clinical trial date test nutrient individually . There strong theoretical rationale combine intervention target three nutrient would substantial benefit relieving symptom advance heart failure . Therefore , purpose study test effect 6-month nutrition intervention dietary sodium reduction combine supplementation lycopene omega-3 fatty acid heart failure symptom , health-related quality life , time heart failure rehospitalization all-cause death . The aim placebo control study 1 ) determine effect 6-month nutrition intervention symptom burden ( edema , shortness air , fatigue ) health relate quality life 3 6 month , time heart failure rehospitalization all-cause death 12 month baseline ; 2 ) compare dietary sodium intake , inflammation , marker oxidative stress nutrition intervention group placebo group 3 6 month ; 3 ) compare body weight , serum lycopene , erythrocyte omega-3 index nutrition intervention group placebo group 3 6 month . A total 150 patient advanced heart failure randomize either nutrition intervention placebo group ( 75 per group ) . The nutrition intervention group receive theory base education skill build intervention design decrease dietary sodium intake ~2 g per day . A research nurse make 4 home visit one follow-up telephone call 6 month provide education-skill building intervention . The intervention group take 3 omega-3 fatty acid capsule ( 350 mg eicosapentaenoic acid 50 mg docosahexaenoic acid ) consume tomato juice tomato-based product contain 20-25 mg lycopene daily six month .
